website_summaries.verdict: A timely playset if your child loves the romance for both Disney and real-life royalty.
pros: Features two 3-inch tall dolls that stand or sit, plus numerous accessories for expansive play
A great set for taking on the go
Made for kids ages 4 years old and up, as pieces are small
Accessories work for all Little Kingdom dolls
cons: Pieces are small, but the carrying case helps them stay organized
Some think the faces look odd

customer_reviews.title: and love them, so i thought my kids would love ...
customer_reviews.text: We have a few other little kingdom sets, and love them, so i thought my kids would love this one as well. Wrong! Their faces don't look right- Rapunzel's is painted on funny....Eugene's nose is giant and bends at a very odd angle. He looks like his face is eternally smashed up against a window. Sadly i'll be returning this. My daughter looked at it, and couldn't believe it was supposed to be the Tangled characters. She asked me to return it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon customer

customer_reviews.title: Good addition to our set
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Christmas for my girls and they like it. It was fun to have a “wedding” version of rapunzel. The only gripe I have is the container it came in. It was clearly used and the container did not look really clean, it was all foggy inside and the pieces were kind of everywhere in there. But the actual figures were in fine shape so it didn’t matter much after that.
customer_reviews.author: Lacee

customer_reviews.title: Nice set!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has a ton of little kingdom princesses but this set she has not put down since she got it, 4 days strong now, she's a huge rupunzel and Flynn fan so she's in love with this set and the price I got it for was a steal, thank you Amazon you helped make one little girl very happy, I definitely recommend this set
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: 3rd box of the same item, clothes for Rapunzel are not make correctly...Pre
customer_reviews.text: Are these really the same item that others are leaving information on also. I need to learn to read reviees befor I purchase....this was 3 sets all bad. Ive bought the same set for a different bday and they were fine...Does Amazon order these to be made from the manufacturer as they all seem to be the same....
customer_reviews.author: Ann M.

customer_reviews.title: Brought happiness to my daughter!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old daughter loves all of these Little Kingdom figures! As a warning, the pieces that come with these figures are very small and may pose a choking hazard for little ones. My daughter loves to mix and match all of the accessories and clothes between the different Little Kingdom characters. I'm thrilled to see her joy!
customer_reviews.author: HappyHARK

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: My little girls like the toy. The bouquet doesn’t fit well in the table. That part could’ve been made better. The menus ripped, and that made the girls upset. Would’ve been nice to have those stronger. Overall, it’s all cute, and they liked it.
customer_reviews.author: MVP

customer_reviews.title: Great price and prompt shipping
customer_reviews.text: Great price and prompt shipping, gave it to my new granddaughter when my son and her mom got married. She loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann W

customer_reviews.title: Looks cool, received different set
customer_reviews.text: Have it a five star, but I received a different set altogether. The toy I received was actually Jasmine, but that's ok. My daughter loves it
customer_reviews.author: melissa breckenridge

customer_reviews.title: Fun set...
customer_reviews.text: This is a cute set. My young daughters have enjoyed it (personally I think Eugene's face doesn't look quite right... but my kids don't care!)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Kids love this. Flower kind of flimsy and Flynn Ryder has a different face but very cute
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: This particular little kingdom item is annoying little pieces that don't fit right
customer_reviews.text: This particular little kingdom item is annoying little pieces that don't fit right. Only good thing is Flynn and brown haired repunzel
customer_reviews.author: Nick Miller

customer_reviews.title: I've bought many toys on here and this is one of my favorite!
customer_reviews.text: This is very cute! I've bought many toys on here and this is one of my favorite!
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Zavala

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality lots of little pieces that might easily be lost
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Big head prince
customer_reviews.text: The prince's head is too big and he always falls over and he doesn't have snap in parts like the female characters.
customer_reviews.author: T. Harris

product_meta.title: Disney Princess Little Kingdom Rapunzel's Royal Wedding
product_meta.description: Celebrate with Rapunzel and Flynn Rider on the best day ever: their wedding day! Rapunzel’s Royal Wedding features the beautiful doll in her wedding gown, Flynn, Pascal, a table, 2 chairs, and Snap-ins. This set is packed in a plastic carrying case for easy storage or play-and-go fun, and comes with everything a princess needs for a romantic wedding reception. Your little dreamer can keep the fun going by creating Rapunzel's outfit and accessorizing her with the included Snap-ins. They can also decorate their Disney Princess with mix-and-match Snap-ins and outfits (sold separately) and can build their own Little Kingdom! Copyright Disney Hasbro and all related terms are trademarks of Hasbro.
feature_bullets: Set comes packed in hard plastic carrying case
Bouquet can snap into the table
Dolls are 3 inches tall and can sit or stand
Dolls come with 2 Snap-ins to mix and match and customize unique looks
Includes 2 dolls, bodice, peplum, skirt, 8 accessories, and 2 Snap-ins.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
